001package More_;
002
003import ij.ImagePlus;
004import ij.gui.EllipseRoi;
005import ij.gui.Roi;
006import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
007import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
008import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
009import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
010
011
012/**
013 * This is for testing placement or ROI points.
014 * 
015 * - Line, FreehandLine, SegmentLine, Point, MultiPoint: no offset (OK)
016 * - Elliptic, Oval, Polygon, Rectangle, RotRectangle: 0.5 pix offset too much
017 * 
018 * Damn - this is confusing: Polygons and FreehandRois behave differently
019 * depending on which menu is used to draw them!!
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 *
023 */
024public class Roi_Add_Element implements PlugInFilter {
025
026        ImagePlus im;
027        
028        @Override
029        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
030                this.im = im;
031                return DOES_ALL;
032        }
033
034        @Override
035        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
036                
037//              Roi roi = new EllipseRoi(1.5, 5.2, 7.9, 5.2, 0.75);
038                EllipseRoi roi = new EllipseRoi(1.5, 5.2, 7.9, 3.2, 0.75);
039
040                im.setRoi(roi, true);
041                
042//              Roi roi = im.getRoi();
043//              IJ.log("roi = " + roi.getClass() + " type = " + roi.getType() + " = " + roi.getTypeAsString());
044//              
045//              Pnt2d[] V = getOutlinePointsFloat(roi);
046//              IJ.log("V=" + Arrays.toString(V));
047//              
048//              ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
049//              ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(0.05, Color.red);
050//              for (Pnt2d p : V) {
051//                      ola.addShape(p.getShape(0.25), stroke);
052//              }
053//              
054//              im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
055        }
056
057        
058        public static Pnt2d[] getOutlinePointsFloat(Roi roi) {
059                return RoiUtils.getOutlinePointsFloat(roi);
060        }
061        
062//      /**
063//       * - Line, FreehandLine, SegmentLine, Point, MultiPoint: no offset needed (OK)

065//       * @param roi
066//       * @return
067//       */
068//      private static boolean needsOffset(Roi roi) {
